name: OKC WordPress Users Group
title: The Benefits of Using Bing
description:
Bing is a major search engine – do you have your website and business set up on Bing? In today’s talk, we’ll go over:

* How to easily set up your Bing Account by importing from Google
* Set up your Bing Webmaster account not using Google and easily verify your site and get your sitemap submitted
* Look at the tools available with Bing Webmaster tools
* Keyword research
* URL submission (submit new or updated blog articles)
* Look at your SEO reports and fix errors and warnings
* Use the Site Scan tool to find common technical SEO issues and fix them

**Speaker bio:** Lynn specializes in working with small, local business owners by helping them get noticed on-line and setting up their websites along with creating their SEO accounts to increase traffic. She offers WordPress maintenance packages and also offers some Microsoft 365 services for the small business owner.

**\*\* This is a online AND in person event. Networking is from 10-10:30am, and the speaker will start at 10:30am.**

For those are would like to join us in person, the venue is:
Sandler Custom Growth Solutions
5850 W Wilshire Blvd · Oklahoma City, OK
